name: Alteil Horizons - turn based tactics card game - Relaunch
blurb: Turn-based tactics card game with a battle grid by creators of Star Ocean & Valkyrie Profile. Artists from Zelda & Final Fantasy

rewards.reward: No Reward

---Tip Jar--- A vote of confidence can sometimes be worth all the money in the world. Thank you from the entire Apocoplay (US) and Coreedge (JP) staff. As a fun bonus, you'll get a 3-star Triple Change card that turns any normal rare from one copy into three (complete playset) permanently!

---Alteil Backer--- At $10, we\u2019ll add your name to the credits as an official Kickstarter Backer, as well as invitations to any pre-launch events or betas. You'll even get an exclusive Avatar for backers only! And yes, you also get the 3-star Triple Change from the Tip Jar level.

---Honored Iczer--- You\u2019ll get everything from the above Alteil Backer ($10) Level, plus we\u2019ll give you all four starter decks (30 cards each) at level 1 to give you a head start! You\u2019ll also get one complete Horizons pre-built deck of your choice (30 cards, $10-$15 value), as well as 1000 extra Gran ($10 value) to spend on whatever you want in the card shop. Even better, you\u2019ll get the following exclusive cards to play with: \u2022 1 Obsidian Dragon Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 1 Zach Wiener (SMBC) Boulder Drop Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 1 Tim Buckley (Ctrl Alt Del) Efreet Kickstarter Exclusive (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 1 Woody Hearn (GU Comics) Folrart Knight Captain Exclusive (not even available for the JP version)

---Dragon Rider--- You get everything from the above Honored Iczer ($20) Level, plus \u2022 two additional Alteil Horizons pre-built decks of your choice (total of three, a 30-45$ value, also redeemable immediately for any Alteil pre-built). \u2022 Two additional copies of Obsidian Dragon Kickstarter Exclusive (for a total of 3 - a complete playset) \u2022 1 Possessed Wildcat Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 1 Digital Art Book of your choice: Refess, Lawtia, Gowen or Falkow (there is one for each of the four factions)

---Master of the Four Gods--- You get everything from the above Dragon Rider ($35) Level, plus  \u2022 One additional Alteil Horizons pre-built deck of your choice (That's four total, 40-60$ value, also redeemable immediately for any Alteil pre-built). \u2022 +1500 Gran (for a total of 2500, or a 25$ value). \u2022 Two additional Zach Wiener (SMBC) Boulder Drop Kickstarter Exclusive (for a total of 3 - a complete playset) \u2022 Two additional Tim Buckley (Ctrl Alt Del) Efreet Kickstarter Exclusive (for a total of 3 - a complete playset) \u2022 Two Additonal Woody Hearn (GU Comics) Folrart Knight Captain Exclusive (for a total of 3 - a complete playset) \u2022 1 Black Mantle Jacques Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 1 year Premium Account Status with 50(!) deck slots instead of the usual 20 \u2022 Digital Download of Alteil Horizons Soundtrack

---Redeemer of the Cursed--- You get everything from the above Master of the Four Gods ($50) Level, plus \u2022+2500 Gran (5000 Gran total, a 50$ value) \u2022 1 Miko Princess Hirume Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 1 copy of this year's Slave of Batora (4 unique cards) before general release, includes Reckless Immortal / Helcuras, Poison Lover / Rosetta, Lord of Wei / Kanyu and Warped Genius / Albert \u2022 All 4 Digital Art Books: Refess, Lawtia, Gowen and Falkow (all four factions)

---Mercenary Lord---  You get everything from the above Redeemer of the Cursed ($65) Level, plus \u2022 +1000 Gran (total 6000 Gran, a 60$ value) \u2022 Two additional copies of Possessed Wildcat Kickstarter Exclusive (for a total of 3 copies, a complete playset)  \u2022 One additional copy of the Slave of Batora Set before general release, that's a total of two copies each of Reckless Immortal / Helcuras, Poison Lover / Rosetta, Lord of Wei / Kanyu and Warped Genius / Albert \u2022 1 Three-Star Triple-Changer card with no expiration date, that lets you take any standard rare card in the game you have a single copy of and turn it into three copies (complete playset) permanently!

\u2022 EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! \u2022  ---Lord of Sun and Moon (at only 95$)--- You get everything from the above Mercenary Lord ($80) Level, plus \u2022 +6000 Gran (for a total of 12000 Gran, a 120$ value) \u2022  Two additional copies of Black Mantle Kickstarter Exclusive (for a total of 3 - a complete playset) \u2022 Two additional copies of Miko Princess Hirume Kickstarter Exclusive (for a total of 3 - a complete playset). \u2022 1 June Bride Legendary Heroine Catria Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 Premium Account Status For Life \u2022 One additional copy the new Slave of Batora Set before general release, for a total of 3 copies each (complete playsets) of Reckless Immortal / Helcuras, Poison Lover / Rosetta, Lord of Wei / Kanyu and Warped Genius / Albert \u2022 4 more Three-Star Triple-Changer cards with no expiration date (for a total of 6)

KINDA EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! ---Vassal of Sun and Moon (Everything from Lord of Sun Level EXCEPT 7000 Gran instead of 12K (So, a total of $70 value -- NOTE that's 10K more Gran than this level had during the first Kickstarter) and 4 3-star Triple Changers instead of 6.

FIRST KICKSTARTER EARLY BIRD SPECIAL -- If you select this reward, and you were on the Early Bird ($95) list (IE picked Early Bird Special) during the first run at the Alteil Horizons Kickstarter, you will get the full EARLY BIRD SPECIAL, which is equal to the Lord of Sun and Moon level. However, if you are NOT on the Early Bird list from last time and you select this, you will instead get the KINDA EARLY BIRD SPECIAL (AKA, Vassal of Sun and Moon) instead.

---Lord of Sun and Moon--- You get everything from the above Mercenary Lord ($80) Level, plus \u2022 +6000 Gran (for a total of 12000 Gran, a 120$ value) \u2022  Two additional copies of Black Mantle Kickstarter Exclusive (for a total of 3 - a complete playset) \u2022 Two additional copies of Miko Princess Hirume Kickstarter Exclusive (for a total of 3 - a complete playset). \u2022 1 June Bride Legendary Heroine Catria Kickstarter Exclusive \u2022 Premium Account Status For Life \u2022 One additional copy the new Slave of Batora Set before general release, for a total of 3 copies each (complete playsets) of Reckless Immortal / Helcuras, Poison Lover / Rosetta, Lord of Wei / Kanyu and Warped Genius / Albert \u2022 4 more Three-Star Triple-Changer cards with no expiration date (for a total of 5)

---BLACK FRIDAY ONLY REWARD LEVEL--- Everything from the Lord of the Sun and Moon level, except-- \u2022 Instead of June Bride Legendary Heroine Catria, you get an entire Magic Doll pre-built deck made just for this (non-character, except 1X Sumer)! \u2022 Includes the Black Friday Bonus Pack, if you don't already get one.  \u2022 Check the Black Friday Update for more info!

---Lone Hero of Lavato--- \u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon ($125) level, plus \u2022 Holy Aura - Batora skips 1st turn for life \u2022 One copy of each card of the first Altiel: Horizons Set (60 cards total) \u2022 One copy of each card of any legacy Alteil Set of your choice (60-100 cards total - will all be playable) (new!) \u2022 Personalized Alteil lessons from one of our top players

---Keeper of the Archive--- \u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon ($125) level, plus \u2022 1 Copy of every non-exclusive alternate art card (seasonal card - about 90 total) card in the game. \u2022 Every non-exclusive alternate art (seasonal card) released in 2014. \u2022 Every non-exclusive Avatar in the game \u2022 1 copy of every non-exclusive card created by our 'big four' illustrators -- Katsuya Terada, Yuji Kaida, Shunya Yamashita, and Hitoshi Yoneda (50+ cards, including a lot of rares) (new!) \u2022 Two 4-Star Triple Change cards and one 5-Star Triple Change cards.

---Community Leader--- \u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon ($125) level, plus \u2022 Ten other accounts of your choice get 1000 Gran ($100 value), one 3-Star Triple Change card, and one copy of Obsidian Dragon (not even available for the JP version) \u2022 Give Community Tournament Prizes as if you were one tier higher. \u2022 When a guild you are part of earns point cards from a non-community tournament guild event, all guild members get +5 Point Cards (Note, for multiple leaders in one guild it's +1 Point Card per additional leader, max of 10). \u2022 If you do not yet have one, your guild gains it\u2019s own private sub-forum \u2022 You get a say in the creation of the Community Tournament System, User created single player content, and any other community based game feature in development \u2022 Unique Avatar Item to Leaders \u2022 The first five times you host a Community Tournament, you get 3 copies of a 4 or 5-star card of your choice (new!).
---Mage Accountant of Regus--- Virtual currency Level \u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon ($125) level, plus \u2022 an additional 16K Gran, for a total of 28K Gran ($280 value).

---Emperor of Lavato--- Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon Level, plus \u2022 1 Copy of every non-exclusive alternate art (seasonal) card in the game (about 90 cards total). \u2022 Every non-exclusive alternate art (seasonal card) released in 2014. \u2022 1 copy of every non-exclusive card created by our 'big four' illustrators -- Katsuya Terada, Yuji Kaida, Shunya Yamashita, and Hitoshi Yoneda (50+ cards, including a lot of rares) (new!) \u2022 Two 4-Star Triple Change cards and one 5-Star Triple Change cards. \u2022 Holy Aura - Batora skips 1st turn for life \u2022 Three copies of each card of the first Altiel: Horizons Set (180 cards total) \u2022 1 of each of the top 100 Soul Cards in the game, by use in high RP decks (new!)
---Crest Financier--- Virtual currency Level \u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon ($125) level, plus \u2022 an additional 49K Gran, for a total of 61K Gran ($610 value).

---Grand Community Leader--- \u2022 Includes everything from the Community Leader and Emperor of Lavato tiers. (only one set of the Lord of Sun and Moon level) \u2022 Two additional copies of Obsidian Dragon and one additional 3 star Triple Change Card to each of the 10 accounts receiving gifts from the Community Leader tier. \u2022 The first ten times you host a Community Tournament, you get 3 copies of a 4 or 5-star card of your choice (instead of 5) (new!).

---Better With Ninjas--- BLACK FRIDAY SALE, lowered from $1,000 \u2022 Includes everything from the Emperor of Lavato level \u2022 Commissioned alternate card art from Christopher Hastings (Dr. McNinja) \u2022 Three copies of the commissioned card on three accounts of your choice (3 for each account) \u2022 A large PDF of the commissioned image. \u2022 3 copies of every Assassin card in the game (about 120 total cards) (new!)

---Epic Hero--- \u2022 Everything from the Grand Community Leader level \u2022 Personal lessons from top Alteil player Worthing and Alteil game designer Logress \u2022 1 of each of the tournament-legal Horizons Core cards on launch (350-450 cards) (new!).

---Royal Banker of Folrart--- Virtual currency Level \u2022 Includes everything from the Lord of Sun and Moon ($125) level, plus \u2022 an additional 118K Gran, for a total of 130K Gran ($1,300 value) \u2022 Two more 4 Star Triple Change cards and two more 5-Star Triple Change cards.

---Monster King--- BLACK FRIDAY SALE, lowered from $5,000 \u2022 Includes everything from the Epic Hero level \u2022 Three copies of every Monster card in the game (180+ total cards). \u2022 Two additional copies of all the tournament-legal Horizons Core cards on launch (3 copies total - 1050-1350 cards) \u2022 Commissioned card from Legendary Magic Artist Nils Hamm. Three copies of the commissioned card on three accounts of your choice (3 for each account) - A large PDF of the commissioned image.

---Alteil Game Designer---BLACK FRIDAY SALE, lowered from $5,000 \u2022 Everything from the Epic Hero level. \u2022 Work with the Apocoplay team and one of the japanese artists to create a new card, new art, new abilities, all directed by you, that will become a permanent part of the game.  \u2022 Two additional copies of all the tournament-legal Horizons Core cards on launch (3 copies total - 1050-1350 cards) \u2022 Custom Avatar by GGG

---Zombie King--- BLACK FRIDAY SALE, lowered from $5,000 \u2022 Includes everything from the Epic Hero level \u2022 Three copies of every Undead card in the game (90+ total cards). \u2022 Two additional copies of all the tournament-legal Horizons Core cards on launch (3 copies total - 1050-1350 cards)  \u2022 Commissioned card art from Arthur Suydam of Marvel Zombies fame. \u2022 Three copies of the commissioned card on three accounts of your choice (3 for each account) \u2022 A large PDF of the commissioned image.

---Fifth God of Lavato--- BLACK FRIDAY SALE, lowered from $10,000 \u2022 Everything from the Epic Hero level. \u2022 Three copies of all Horizons Core and non-exclusive legacy cards on launch (3000+ cards) \u2022 Work with the Apocoplay team and Japanese artists to create a new EX Set, 4 pieces of new art, new abilities, all directed by you, that will become a permanent part of the game. \u2022 Work with our lead writer to create a story for this new EX: set that will become a permanent part of the game\u2019s storyline. \u2022 One of the new EX cards will be based on your appearance, or the appearance of a friend. -Custom Avatar by GGG
